data.what_is:
Surfline Media specializes in CRM platforms, automation, and full-funnel marketing. Our goal is to provide businesses with innovative strategies, expert guidance, and cutting-edge technologies that give them a competitive edge.
We understand that each business has a unique story, and our focus is on finding the most suitable strategy and system to meet their needs. Our integrated marketing services complement these efforts, delivering comprehensive solutions that drive growth and success. With Surfline Media, businesses can expect attentive listening, personalized approaches, and a commitment to empowering their growth in the digital landscape.
data.product_description:
Surfline Media specializes in CRM platforms, automation, and full-funnel marketing. Our goal is to provide businesses with innovative strategies, expert guidance, and cutting-edge technologies that give them a competitive edge.
We understand that each business has a unique story, and our focus is on finding the most suitable strategy and system to meet their needs. Our integrated marketing services complement these efforts, delivering comprehensive solutions that drive growth and success. With Surfline Media, businesses can expect attentive listening, personalized approaches, and a commitment to empowering their growth in the digital landscape.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Based on 10 Surfline Media reviews. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications. This feature was mentioned in 10 Surfline Media reviews.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements This feature was mentioned in 10 Surfline Media reviews.

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Based on 10 Surfline Media reviews. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc. 10 reviewers of Surfline Media have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Based on 10 Surfline Media reviews. Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 10 Surfline Media reviews. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application. 10 reviewers of Surfline Media have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: As reported in 10 Surfline Media reviews. Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores This feature was mentioned in 10 Surfline Media reviews.

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: As reported in 10 Surfline Media reviews. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion. This feature was mentioned in 10 Surfline Media reviews.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: As reported in 10 Surfline Media reviews. Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history. 10 reviewers of Surfline Media have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Based on 10 Surfline Media reviews. Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Based on 10 Surfline Media reviews. Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system. This feature was mentioned in 10 Surfline Media reviews.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI. This feature was mentioned in 10 Surfline Media reviews.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar. This feature was mentioned in 10 Surfline Media reviews.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Based on 10 Surfline Media reviews. Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices. This feature was mentioned in 10 Surfline Media reviews.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: As reported in 10 Surfline Media reviews. Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions. This feature was mentioned in 10 Surfline Media reviews.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: As reported in 10 Surfline Media reviews. Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: As reported in 10 Surfline Media reviews. Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: As reported in 10 Surfline Media reviews. Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Based on 10 Surfline Media reviews. Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: As reported in 10 Surfline Media reviews. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline. 10 reviewers of Surfline Media have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors. 10 reviewers of Surfline Media have provided feedback on this feature.

initial_reviews.review_title: An illustrious and conscientious platform for CRM and marketing strategies
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Surfline Media?
The platform is great as it helps surfers make well-informed decisions about their sessions by offering surf forecasting, reports, and live cameras. The software is an incredible one as it saves its users from repetition of tasks hence saving their time and removing all the tedious effort as it has automation features that enable them to focus on more important work. The product is a beneficial tool to most companies as it gives real-time insights of their client data and this helps the team to plan and set their objectives. Surfline media helps their users to get the contrast platform that enables them to operate in different ways and also assists the users in obtaining current innovative market approaches and management strategies.

What do you dislike about Surfline Media?
I don't have many complaints about the platform but what frustrates me most is the fact that when I want to access some of the platform's premium features I have to pay for a subscription which sometimes is not budget-friendly to me.

What problems is Surfline Media solving and how is that benefiting you?
The software is great as it enables users to solve the problem of providing precise surf forecasts and real-time surf conditions and this benefits users as it allows them to plan for their surfing activities more effectually. The platform helps to provide sales and marketing teams with great reliable data that allows their campaign to move hence enhancing the sales and the cost of marketing is deducted. The product enables individuals to streamline their marketing operations with great productivity and also enables them to reach their customers via several channels

initial_reviews.review_title: The problem of uncertainty, within the surfing community
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Surfline Media?
The inaccuracy of Surfline Medias has obstructed my experience. Whenever I want to plan my surfing sessions I never always rely on their reports. The live HD cams are also obstructive for me as they does not allow me to check the conditions in time.

What do you dislike about Surfline Media?
The less user friendly interface and difficult navigation make it hectic to find the information I need. All Surfline Media is an poor tool for any surfer who wants to catch that perfect wave.One aspect that needs to be improved is the cluttered website interface of Surfline Media, which makes it difficult to navigate and find information.

What problems is Surfline Media solving and how is that benefiting you?
The presence of disruptive advertisements on their website hampers the user experience. Moreover I have found their customer support lacking with slow response times and unhelpful solutions provided for any issues faced. These factors somewhat diminish my satisfaction and usability of the Surfline Media platform.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Surfline Media?
Surfline Media CRM software has been a game-changer for our business at BFW Displays! It streamlines sales, automates tasks, and improves email marketing. From lead generation to closing deals, Surfline Media simplifies every step, saving us time and resources. Its automation features eliminate hours of repetitive tasks, freeing our team for more important work. With its email marketing functionality, we create personalized campaigns and see increased customer engagement and conversions. Highly recommended for optimizing operations and driving growth!

What do you dislike about Surfline Media?
When it comes to Surfline Media CRM software, there's a lot to love, but if I had to pinpoint a downside, it would be the limited customization options. While Surfline Media offers an impressive set of features and functionalities, the ability to tailor certain aspects to our specific business needs would be a welcome addition.

What problems is Surfline Media solving and how is that benefiting you?
Surfline Media CRM software is a problem-solving solution for us at BFW Displays. It streamlines sales processes, automates tasks, and revolutionizes email marketing. From lead generation to deal closure, Surfline Media ensures a smooth flow, saving us time and enhancing customer satisfaction. Its automation features free up our team to focus on important tasks, increasing efficiency and reducing errors. With its robust email marketing functionality, we create personalized campaigns that boost customer engagement, brand visibility, and conversions. Surfline Media empowers us to operate efficiently, deliver exceptional service, and achieve tangible business growth.

initial_reviews.review_title: Surfline Media offer a great range of services at one place
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Surfline Media?
Surfline Media is a web development and marketing agency that specializes in helping businesses of all sizes grow their online presence. The company has over 15 years of experience in the industry and a team of experienced professionals who are passionate about helping their clients succeed.

Surfline Media offers a wide range of services, including website design, development, and hosting; search engine optimization (SEO); social media marketing; and email marketing. The company also offers a CRM system that helps businesses track leads, manage customer relationships, and analyze data.

Some of the pros of surfline media are as under:

1. Experienced team of professionals
2. Wide range of services
3. Proven track record of success
4. Google Premier Partner
6. Competitive pricing

What do you dislike about Surfline Media?
There is  nothing to dislike about surfline but some of the services may be more expensive than other agencies. Another thing that I don't like is that they are not present everywhere.

What problems is Surfline Media solving and how is that benefiting you?
Surfline media solves a number of problems for surfers, including:
Providing accurate and up-to-date surf forecasts: Surfline's forecasts are based on data from a network of buoys and webcams, as well as expert analysis. This allows surfers to plan their sessions with confidence, knowing that they are going to find the best waves possible.
Delivering breaking surf news: Surfline is the first to break surf news, thanks to its team of experienced journalists and photographers. This gives surfers the inside scoop on the latest conditions and swells, so they can be the first to hit the waves.
Streaming live surf video: Surfline's live surf cam network gives surfers a front-row seat to some of the best waves in the world. This is a great way to scout new spots, learn new tricks, or simply watch the pros in action.

Surfline Media benefits us in a number of ways, including:

Increased brand awareness: Surfline's large and engaged audience provides a great opportunity for companies to increase brand awareness.
Lead generation: Surfline's users are highly motivated to purchase surf-related products and services. This makes Surfline a valuable lead generation tool for companies in the surf industry.
Sales growth: Surfline's data-driven insights can help companies improve their marketing and sales strategies. This can lead to increased sales and revenue.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Surfline Media?
One of the standout features of Surfline Media is its incredibly accurate and reliable surf forecasting. Whether I'm planning a weekend surf trip or simply want to check the conditions for my local break, Surfline Media provides real-time updates that are second to none. The detailed surf reports, complete with wave height, swell direction, and wind conditions, enable me to make informed decisions about when and where to paddle out. This level of accuracy has significantly enhanced my overall surfing experience and helped me score some unforgettable sessions.

What do you dislike about Surfline Media?
While the surf forecasting provided by Surfline Media is generally accurate and reliable, there have been occasional instances where the predictions did not align with the actual conditions. Although it's important to acknowledge the unpredictability of nature, a more consistent forecasting system or improved communication of any discrepancies would be appreciated. This would allow users to plan their surf sessions with even greater confidence and avoid potential disappointments.

What problems is Surfline Media solving and how is that benefiting you?
Extensive Spot Coverage: Surfline Media offers comprehensive coverage of surf spots worldwide, from renowned breaks to lesser-known gems. This solves the problem of limited information and allows surfers to explore new destinations confidently. The platform provides valuable insights, local knowledge, and detailed spot guides, enabling me to discover and experience new waves while being well-prepared for the conditions and characteristics of each spot. This extensive coverage has expanded my surfing horizons and added excitement to my surf travel adventures.

This level of accuracy has significantly enhanced my overall surfing experience and helped me score some unforgettable sessions.

The platform is great as it helps surfers make well-informed decisions about their sessions by offering surf forecasting, reports, and live cameras. The software is an incredible one as it saves its users from repetition of tasks hence saving their time and removing all the tedious effort as it has automation features that enable them to focus on more important work. The product is a beneficial tool to most companies as it gives real-time insights of their client data and this helps the team to plan and set their objectives. Surfline media helps their users to get the contrast platform that enables them to operate in different ways and also assists the users in obtaining current innovative market approaches and management strategies.

I don't have many complaints about the platform but what frustrates me most is the fact that when I want to access some of the platform's premium features I have to pay for a subscription which sometimes is not budget-friendly to me.

What do you like best about Surfline Media?
The inaccuracy of Surfline Medias has obstructed my experience. Whenever I want to plan my surfing sessions I never always rely on their reports. The live HD cams are also obstructive for me as they does not allow me to check the conditions in time.

What do you dislike about Surfline Media?
The less user friendly interface and difficult navigation make it hectic to find the information I need. All Surfline Media is an poor tool for any surfer who wants to catch that perfect wave.One aspect that needs to be improved is the cluttered website interface of Surfline Media, which makes it difficult to navigate and find information.

The presence of disruptive advertisements on their website hampers the user experience. Moreover I have found their customer support lacking with slow response times and unhelpful solutions provided for any issues faced. These factors somewhat diminish my satisfaction and usability of the Surfline Media platform.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Surfline Media?
Surfline Media CRM software has been a game-changer for our business at BFW Displays! It streamlines sales, automates tasks, and improves email marketing. From lead generation to closing deals, Surfline Media simplifies every step, saving us time and resources. Its automation features eliminate hours of repetitive tasks, freeing our team for more important work. With its email marketing functionality, we create personalized campaigns and see increased customer engagement and conversions. Highly recommended for optimizing operations and driving growth!

What do you dislike about Surfline Media?
When it comes to Surfline Media CRM software, there's a lot to love, but if I had to pinpoint a downside, it would be the limited customization options. While Surfline Media offers an impressive set of features and functionalities, the ability to tailor certain aspects to our specific business needs would be a welcome addition.

Its automation features free up our team to focus on important tasks, increasing efficiency and reducing errors. With its robust email marketing functionality, we create personalized campaigns that boost customer engagement, brand visibility, and conversions. Surfline Media empowers us to operate efficiently, deliver exceptional service, and achieve tangible business growth.

all_reviews.review_title: Surfline Media offer a great range of services at one place
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Surfline Media?
Surfline Media is a web development and marketing agency that specializes in helping businesses of all sizes grow their online presence. The company has over 15 years of experience in the industry and a team of experienced professionals who are passionate about helping their clients succeed.

Surfline Media offers a wide range of services, including website design, development, and hosting; search engine optimization (SEO); social media marketing; and email marketing. The company also offers a CRM system that helps businesses track leads, manage customer relationships, and analyze data.

Some of the pros of surfline media are as under:

1. Experienced team of professionals
2. Wide range of services
3. Proven track record of success
4. Google Premier Partner
6. Competitive pricing

What do you dislike about Surfline Media?
There is  nothing to dislike about surfline but some of the services may be more expensive than other agencies. Another thing that I don't like is that they are not present everywhere.

What problems is Surfline Media solving and how is that benefiting you?
Surfline media solves a number of problems for surfers, including:
Providing accurate and up-to-date surf forecasts: Surfline's forecasts are based on data from a network of buoys and webcams, as well as expert analysis. This allows surfers to plan their sessions with confidence, knowing that they are going to find the best waves possible.
Delivering breaking surf news: Surfline is the first to break surf news, thanks to its team of experienced journalists and photographers. This gives surfers the inside scoop on the latest conditions and swells, so they can be the first to hit the waves.
Streaming live surf video: Surfline's live surf cam network gives surfers a front-row seat to some of the best waves in the world. This is a great way to scout new spots, learn new tricks, or simply watch the pros in action.

Surfline Media benefits us in a number of ways, including:

Increased brand awareness: Surfline's large and engaged audience provides a great opportunity for companies to increase brand awareness.
Lead generation: Surfline's users are highly motivated to purchase surf-related products and services. This makes Surfline a valuable lead generation tool for companies in the surf industry.
Sales growth: Surfline's data-driven insights can help companies improve their marketing and sales strategies. This can lead to increased sales and revenue.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Surfline Media?
One of the standout features of Surfline Media is its incredibly accurate and reliable surf forecasting. Whether I'm planning a weekend surf trip or simply want to check the conditions for my local break, Surfline Media provides real-time updates that are second to none. The detailed surf reports, complete with wave height, swell direction, and wind conditions, enable me to make informed decisions about when and where to paddle out. This level of accuracy has significantly enhanced my overall surfing experience and helped me score some unforgettable sessions.

What do you dislike about Surfline Media?
While the surf forecasting provided by Surfline Media is generally accurate and reliable, there have been occasional instances where the predictions did not align with the actual conditions. Although it's important to acknowledge the unpredictability of nature, a more consistent forecasting system or improved communication of any discrepancies would be appreciated. This would allow users to plan their surf sessions with even greater confidence and avoid potential disappointments.

What problems is Surfline Media solving and how is that benefiting you?
Extensive Spot Coverage: Surfline Media offers comprehensive coverage of surf spots worldwide, from renowned breaks to lesser-known gems. This solves the problem of limited information and allows surfers to explore new destinations confidently. The platform provides valuable insights, local knowledge, and detailed spot guides, enabling me to discover and experience new waves while being well-prepared for the conditions and characteristics of each spot. This extensive coverage has expanded my surfing horizons and added excitement to my surf travel adventures.
